description:
{"blocks":[{"key":"4q9n","text":"This protocol details the parallel rapid expression and purification of proteins for crystallography (PREPX) at a 1 L culture scale. Recombinant proteins are expressed in Escherichia coli using the autoinduction method and then purified in parallel using a IMAC, desalt, tag cleavage, reverse IMAC and gel filtration work flow.


","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":171,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"9vbb2","text":"Triton x-100 is currently restricted for use in the EU and cannot be used without an exemption certificate REACH Annex XIV (Jan 2021). It can be readily subsituted with IGEPAL CA-630 (which is likely to be subject to the same restrictions in the near future). Alternatives that also maybe used are Tergitol 15-S-9 or Tween-20 or octyl glucoside.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
